price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߕߋ߲߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ߫ ( ߖߎ߮ ߛߊ߬ߣߊ߲ ) ߠߋ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߛߣߐ߬ߡߍ ߟߎ߬ ߢߍߡߊ߬
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
